definition: to dismiss and replace (sb)/to replace (sb or sth)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Some memories are set to be irremovable.
sentences.chinese: 一些记忆是确定为不可撤换。

sentences.english: Next, Lu wanted to change the county magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 接着鹿钟麟又要撤换县长。

sentences.english: When they reorganized the company, they made a clean sweep of all the holdovers .
sentences.chinese: 当他们重新改组公司时，撤换了所有的留用人员。

sentences.english: The sponge chair pad could be dismissed and replaced freely.
sentences.chinese: 上置的海绵椅垫可以根据需要撤换。

sentences.english: Have you failed to attend a hearing on removability or inadmissibility within the last five years?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有出席在过去五年内就撤换，或受理听证？

sentences.english: The right to elect chieftains and to depose them.
sentences.chinese: 选举和撤换酋长的权利。

sentences.english: The teacher has lost control of the class; he will have to be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 这个老师已控制不住该班，他将被撤换掉。

sentences.english: The firms' chief executives, Daniel Mudd and Richard Syron, will be replaced, but will stay for a transition period.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司的首席执行官临时留任，但最终会被撤换。

sentences.english: Some aging higher officers inherited from the Manchurian days were sacked.
sentences.chinese: 从满洲时代遗留下来的一些年老的高级军官给撤换了。

sentences.english: The skirmish prompted President Lee Myung-bak to replace his defense minister on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 冲突导致李明博星期五撤换了国防部长。

sentences.english: The first three days of proceedings had been taken up with defense notions to recuse.
sentences.chinese: 前三天的诉讼程序主要是采用撤换辩护概念。

sentences.english: The mayor displaced the police chief.

definition: to remove sb from their post/to dismiss
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
to sack/to remove from a position/to depose
to ask sb to resign from a post
to cut/to throw out/to depose (from office)/to tear off
to remain in office/to hold on to one's job
to accuse of misconduct (in official task)/to impeach
